title: Myleschetty
author: Myleschetty
content: I am not a merit source but in this season of love I decided to join the league of users that introduce a game to help users with few merit and I also give them a new idea for writing their seeds phrase. I come up with a game called crypto gram. "A cryptogram is a type of puzzle that consists of a short piece of encrypted text. Generally, the cipher used to encrypt the text is simple enough that the cryptogram can be solved by hand." An example: DFTVT XVT PLG? is Where are you? How to solve a CryptogramCryptogram is a way of reading messages in a form of code apart from the participant earning merit through this game it can also help them develop a new way of reading their BTC wallet seeds phrase to avoid the mistake made recently by a Bitcoiner which the cop body cam exposed his wallet seed phrase to the public.Hint: Every cryptogram message I will post are wise quote and the best to solve a cryptogram is to go for the smaller or repeated words in the sentence. This game is for everyone though and the first person to post the right answer is the winner. Let's have some fun.
